title: Official All-Star Challenge Teams Locked In!

replies.body: I was really hoping to see Jatt in this :c
Everyone voted for Toyz, and I guess the NA and EU hoping for Jatt wasn't enough to outvote the Asian player base! I'm still looking forward to seeing Misaya and Toyz though!

I'm an NA player and I voted for Misaya and Toyz. These guys are legends for a reason. Jatt is a veteran player too but I'd far rather watch the season 2 "faker-before-there-was-a-faker" and the father of Twisted Fate than Jatt. I see enough of Jatt casting.
Just logged in to down vote this "**asian player**" discriminating comment/post. Kind of offensive TBH
i believe u took it wrong i think his comment is more to the point of more asians play league than NA and EU

OtterPraetor was speculating that a greater quantity of players of the Asian demographic probably swung the vote for Toyz. L2readpls before logging in just to downvote. :)

-a proud NA player

edit: As for my opinion, I'm excited to see so many big names and look forward to the players from different backgrounds having to come together! Hope to see more All-star events in the future!!

OMG THAT MADLIFE/DOUBLELIFT BOT LANE
{{champion:67}}  and {{champion:412}}  GG
i think this is hexakill mode not the ordinary 5v5.
Still GG lol
Madlift sounds better than LiftLife :P
What about DoubleLife?
No, LiftLife is for 5v5 and Misaya is going on hexakill.
I had the same thought until I remembered that Aphromoo has been just as much of a god this season :P
*Madlife {{champion:53}} Doublelife {{champion:67}}  {{summoner:2}}
How will they communicate with each other??? Translator in the microphone?
most of the pro's Eu Na and Kor Al know a little english weither its broken or not
how hard is it to say kill in English
"Kirr" will have to suffice.
I think I'd be hurt if I was asian {{item:3151}}
so true...............so true
That one made me laugh XD
now this is a funny thought... guess we're gunna see sooooo many pings
Sorry, dont know how it works, first allstar series since i started playing league.
Bro, all you do is bot match anyways, your level 30 with 6 normals wins, calm down man lol

It's funny how you make fun of someone with only 6 normal wins, but you are in Bronze V. Not only that, your losses double your wins. You are in no position to criticize another summoner, especially when you are bad at the game. Calm down
To be frank, why was rank or skill even brought up?  Lol. He basically just said "Hey guys I'm new" and master blaster tanker man comes and shoves an insult sandwhich down his throat.
Orrrrrrr you could not be a dick to people who enjoy the game, that's a possibility too.

Wanna see how toxic some players in the community could be? This fellow asked a simple question about how All-Stars works and LoyalxTanker comes along and makes fun of him for no reason. Also, he is Bronze V and making fun of someone for being bad at the game...
You know that's not how it... *sigh* never mind. {{summoner:3}}
Because the first place goes as a team, not as individual players.
Upvote if you are going!
im virtually going :') {{item:3151}}
have a link to watch it?
lolesports.com
thank you.
I Someday want to be famous ): THATS MY DREAM
In that case, you might want to be more flexible in your roles.
on the contrary, normals like us have to fill and be flexible.  Famous bitches get whatever they want just cuz.
Bjergsen's tha man, but no way he's gonna beat the Madlife/Doublelift combo. He better get that{{champion:43}} hexakill tho.
WOW, no C9 really?...{{champion:32}}
Region champions don't get to compete in fun matches so no cloud 9 or fnatic players
TSM purpose throw :P bjergsen can play fun matches now.
comment below is {{champion:412}} hold (show)

"Comment is below threshold (show)"

Swing and a miss! Strike One!
c9 is the best and we have seen it tons of time i think the people that have been chosen are epic players including toyz  Bjergsen doublelift
i think the reason C9 isnt there is because their biggest strength is how they are as a team although the players themselves are AWESOME
what do you mean isn't there? they are in a diff bracket at all stars because they won the playoffs
What you say C9 is the best but have a TSM pic?
Probably speaking based off of who won the split, but likes TSM more than C9.
